Uses of Class
com.irurueta.geometry.Line3D

Packages that use Line3D
Package
Description
com.irurueta.geometry
This package contains classes to work with basic geometric entities such as 2D or 3D points, lines, planes, 2D or 3D triangles or polygons, circles, spheres, rotations, transformations etc.

  • Uses of Line3D in com.irurueta.geometry

    Description
    final void
    AffineTransformation3D.setTransformationFromLines(Line3D inputLine1, Line3D inputLine2, Line3D outputLine1, Line3D outputLine2)

    final void

    Estimates this transformation internal matrix by providing 3 corresponding original and transformed lines.

    Modifier
    Constructor
    Description
     
    AffineTransformation3D(Line3D inputLine1, Line3D inputLine2, Line3D outputLine1, Line3D outputLine2)

    ProjectiveTransformation3D(Line3D inputLine1, Line3D inputLine2, Line3D inputLine3, Line3D outputLine1, Line3D outputLine2, Line3D outputLine3)
